topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557e71df63687240e90018d7#post_557e71df63687240e90018d7
Because she's starting to realize that his small annoyances are turning into bigger ones, and she doesn't want to have to deal with that.

I personally don't like him because he acts in strange ways that i am unable to comprehend.

For example, we were moving a tree in the garden, and i had to dig a hole for it, and to do that i had to move stones around. So, i moved the stones, and had started digging the hole when he comes over and says "Goddamnit Zak, you haven't moved the stones enough." and i'm like "Ok, sorry, i'll move them more." and then i proceed to moving the stones more but he's just like "Don't even bother. Just go away, you never put any effort into anything."
